en.purpose: To calculate the BALL score and predict complete response rate based on the recorded clinical parameters.
en.use: In patients with relapsed or refractory Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia (CLL) to support treatment decisions.
en.misuse: Not to be used for initial diagnosis of CLL, staging, or for predicting response to novel agents (e.g., BTK inhibitors, BCL-2 inhibitors).
